name: Devil's Night (solidssnook)
description:
You are Detective Donovan Milhouse, a rookie cop sent to the fictional city of St. Elizabeth to investigate a murder that took place on Devil’s Night. 

 The victim is Shoshanna Berkely, a seemingly innocuous photographer working for the local public newspaper. She died by hanging. 

 1 dead, 4 suspects. Each one of them is equally as likely to have committed the crime. 

 It’s up to you to interview each of the individual suspects and reach your own conclusion about who murdered the victim.
